Description: The analysis or technology used to generate the data in this file

Valid Values: CCF-BSO values (not listed for purposes of this RFC)

Description: Was individual fasting when the sample was taken (true/false)?
Identifying string linked to the individual or animal being studied, provided by the data contributor
Was the sample taken after death (true/false)?
Specifies the type of nucleic acid (DNA, RNA, Pooled, etc.) found in a sample.
Valid Values: bulk cell,single cell,bulk nuclei,single nucleus,mitochondria,sorted cells,sorted nuclei

Description: Indicate the organ the specimen is from
Valid Values: NCI values (not listed for purposes of this RFC)

Description: The calculated age of the sample, measurement is determined or coded by the data contributor.Other,Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable

The subject's age at the time of specimen extraction is the individual's age (since birth) at the time a given specimen was extracted. Measured as age in years. Other, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable
Identifying string linked to a particular sample or specimen, provided by the data contributor
Indicate the biological area of the specimen
Valid Values: Human Reference Atlas values (not listed for purposes of this RFC)
ontology: Human Reference Atlas Common Coordinate Framework Ontology

Description: Type of biological material comprising the Specimen
Indicate the tissue the specimen is from
The volume of the tissue sample. Measured in microliters.
The mass of the tissue specimen. Measured in mg.
